description: Kyoko is a blonde haired troublemaker and one of the members of the Ms. Mizuno Fan Club at her high school. She likes playing video games and as such often goes to the arcade after school; she is very promiscuous and has had numerous romantic and sexual experiences with men and boys. Because of her laid back and spoiled personality, it`s been heavily implied that she`s been raised in a wealthy, lavish, and pampered home life-(e.g. coming from a rich family).
name: Sahara Kyouko
